title: SKATEBOARDING_EXPLAINED
description:
"EASILY THE BEST INSTRUCTIONAL SKATEBOARDING DVD THAT I&#039;VE SEEN" - Skateboard.About.com

"DEFINITELY RECOMMENDED"-Concrete Wave Magazine

"THIS IS THE PINNACLE OF WHAT A HOW TO VIDEO SHOULD BE"-Nate Sherwood, Transworld Skateboarding Magazine

"AMAZING" - CCS

"In this critically acclaimed DVD, Top Lake Owen instructor, and Mentality Pro, Dan MacFarlane takes you through his Proven system and breaks the tricks down in the same way that has helped his students learn. If you are new to skateboarding, or if you have been skateboarding for a while, and want to get better, this is the DVD for you!"

Learn these tricks and more!
Ollie, Drop in, Nollie, Pop Shove-its, Kickflip, Heelflip, Varial Kickflip, Backside Flip, Frontside Flip, 360 Flip, Boardslides, Noseslide, 50/50
Over 30 tricks are Explained!

3 Main sections in "Skateboarding Explained"
The Fundamentals every skateboarder should know
The Basics of Street and Ramp
The Most Wanted tricks

(For all ages) Runtime 70 minutes
